We provide a helper method which aims to make plotting indicators simple. For further information on the charting API please see our Charting section.

private HullMovingAverage _hma;

// In Initialize()
var symbol = AddEquity("SPY").Symbol;
_hma = HMA(symbol, period);

// In OnData()
if (_hma.IsReady)
{
    Plot("My Indicators", "HMA Current", _hma.Current);
}
# In Initialize()
symbol = self.AddEquity("SPY").Symbol
self.hma = self.HMA(symbol, period)

# In OnData()
if self.hma.IsReady:
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "HMA Current", self.hma.Current);
